content.rendered: Customer Service Representative/Collections This company works with regional and local court systems, overseeing accounts and collections for court fines. Initially they started out as strictly collections, but have adapted a customer service attitude for their processes. Looking for someone who is patient/friendly, and has strong computer/phone skills. Pay is $11/$12 an hour plus commissions.
